content.new:
For some reason several test fails if they update a camera. This happens with RaysUnitBox and LaserVertical tests in [gpu_rays tests](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/pull-requests/98/add-gpu-rays-class-for-lidar-simulation/diff#chg-test/integration/gpu_rays.cc). 

If you comment one of them, it passes but if you run both, the second will always fails. Order doesn't matter.

It looks like something is not cleaned properly.
